summary: DOD's effort to modernize its F-35 aircraft continues to face challenges that we identified in our prior work . We testified that: The program's cost estimate for modernization grew by billions of dollars, and DOD didn't fully report what caused this increase The program hasn't fully installed the hardware and software needed for future aircraft upgrades because of delays developing the needed technologies Issues with...
title: F-35 Joint Strike Fighter: More Actions Needed to Explain Cost Growth and Support Engine Modernization Decision
